content.raw:
For Qt < 5.10 (conda is 5.9) on linux and macos this doesn't work, but this is a bug in Qt [now fixed](https://bugreports.qt.io/browse/QTBUG-4453) so I'm just going to leave it. It is also harmless. The bug is that `repaint()` calls have no effect while the event loop isn't running, so the splash screen simply isn't drawn (this code does not have the event loop running other than when it first shows the window, otherwise it would interfere with the application. I learned this by segfaulting BLACS.). 

Conda sticks to long term support releases of Qt so they will likely update to 5.12 soon which came out recently.
